result.eng: In the dark world of espionage, you cannot be sure of anything.
result.ga: i saol dorcha na spiaireachta ní féidir bheith cinnte de rud ar bith
result.orig: i saol dorcha na spiaireachta ní féidir bheith cinnte de rud ar bith

result.ponchtml: i saol dorċa na spiaireaċta ní féidir ḃeiṫ cinnte de rud ar biṫIn the dark world of espionage, you cannot be sure of anything.
